Summary: Red circle with orange flashing light in center
divs: sighting detailsi was driving on my way home from work and a large red object with a large orange\yellow flashing light in the center appeared over the western horizon. the sheer excitement of seeing such an object took my attention off the road, so i had to stop the car. i had absolutely no idea what it might have been, as i had never seen anything like it in the past. my main reaction during the sighting was utter amazement. i couldn't help myself from shouting "what the hell is that thing?!" out loud. it was utterly bizarre. i watched it fly in a zigzag pattern across the sky-- it took about two minutes for the object to disappear over the eastern horizon. it appeared to be flying much higher in the sky by the time it had disappeared.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Lake St Louis
There were no other sightings in Lake St Louis on or around August 22nd 2010
